com.philips.pins.shinelib.capabilities

Interface SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdate

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SHNCapability
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CapabilityFirmwareUpdateDiComm

    public interface SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdate
extends SHNCapability
    Interface to upload and deploy firmware to a peripheral.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdate.SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdateListener
      Interface to receive results of firmware upload and deploy.
      static class  SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdate.SHNFirmwareUpdateState
      Possible states of the firmware update capability.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void abortFirmwareUpload()
      Abort current running firmware upload.
      void deployFirmware()
      Deploy uploaded firmware image.
      SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdate.SHNFirmwareUpdateState getState()
      Return current state of the capability.
      void getUploadedFirmwareInfo(SHNFirmwareInfoResultListener shnFirmwareInfoResultListener)
      Return information about the current uploading firmware.
      void setSHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdateListener(SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdate.SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdateListener shnCapabilityFirmwareUpdateListener)
      Set callback to receive results of firmware upload and deploy.
      boolean supportsUploadWithoutDeploy()
      Indicates if the peripheral support upload without deploy.
      void uploadFirmware(byte[] firmwareData)
      Start firmware upload.

    • Method Detail

      • supportsUploadWithoutDeploy

        boolean supportsUploadWithoutDeploy()
        Indicates if the peripheral support upload without deploy.
        Returns:
        true if upload is possible without mandatory deploy, false otherwise

      • uploadFirmware

        void uploadFirmware(byte[] firmwareData)
        Start firmware upload.

        Firmware upload can only be started in SHNFirmwareUpdateStateIdle state. The callback is provided via registered SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdateListener.

        Parameters:
        firmwareData -

      • abortFirmwareUpload

        void abortFirmwareUpload()
        Abort current running firmware upload. The callback is provided via registered SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdateListener.

      • deployFirmware

        void deployFirmware()
        Deploy uploaded firmware image. The callback is provided via registered SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdateListener.

      • getUploadedFirmwareInfo

        void getUploadedFirmwareInfo(SHNFirmwareInfoResultListener shnFirmwareInfoResultListener)
        Return information about the current uploading firmware.
        Parameters:
        shnFirmwareInfoResultListener - callback to receive the result

      • setSHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdateListener

        void setSHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdateListener(SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdate.SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdateListener shnCapabilityFirmwareUpdateListener)
        Set callback to receive results of firmware upload and deploy.
        Parameters:
        shnCapabilityFirmwareUpdateListener - to receive updates

      • getState

        SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdate.SHNFirmwareUpdateState getState()
        Return current state of the capability.
        Returns:
        current state of the capability
